titles.title: O Father Help (timing a little work)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Father help Lest our poor love refuse For Thy redeemed The life that they would choose And in our fear of loss For them or pain Forget eternal gain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach us to pray Remembering Calvary For as the Master Must the servant be We see their face Set toward Jerusalem Let us not hinder them{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Show us the gain The golden harvest there For corn of wheat That they have buried here Lest human love Defraud them and betray Teach us O God to pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach us to pray O Thou who didst not spare Thy Well-Beloved Lead us on in prayer Purge from the earthly Give us love divine Father like Thine - like Thine{/lang-eng}
